title: AlternativeTo Scraper
description: Scrape AI tools and alternatives from AlternativeTo.net using fast listing/API-first extraction with pagination. Provide either a keyword or startUrls.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (list)
startUrls.description: List of AlternativeTo URLs to start from (search, category, or software alternatives pages). If provided, overrides Keyword.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Search keyword used when explicit start URLs are not provided.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of tools
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of tools to collect. Leave empty to collect all available tools.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Optional. Enable Apify Proxy on platform if you hit blocks.
